resources.string: This application was developed to implement WordAPI service. Please enter the desired word in the first tab " Search "and click on" Search", make sure there is Internet access. You will see a lot of information related to the word (such as definitions, use cases, origin, etc.). The word can be added to "favorites" by clicking on the "star" icon on the top right. On the second tab you will see a list of favorites. To remove a word from favorites, you can click the Delete button in the favorites tab, or in the first tab in the found word click on the "star" (if the word is already added, it will be removed).
